name: VILCHES
goal: Consultancy specialised in the cultural and entertainment sectors. We provide strategic counselling on policy issues as well as conduct legal analyses of international, European and national legal regimes and help companies identify EU funding opportunities and develop the project.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Digital agenda, intellectual property rights, culture and media policy, audiovisual policy, sports policy, competition policy, trade policy, research and development as well as innovation policy, EU Strategy for cultural diplomacy
